TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to add user role.
TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Click on Add new user role button.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on add new user role button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on add new user role button .
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on add new user role button .

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter user role name.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter user role name.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter user role name.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on page privileges tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on page privileges tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on page privileges tab.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select all application pages.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select all application pages.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select all application pages.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select all admin pages.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select all admin pages.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select all admin pages.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on field privileges tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on field privileges tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on field privileges tab.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to select all form fields.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to select all form fields.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to select all form fields.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is click on save button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on save button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on save button.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to verify toast message.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to verify toast message.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to verify toast message.
